items.name: Kicking off the planting season in Limburg with BLG!

fields.event-name: Kicking off the planting season in Limburg with BLG!
fields.event_details: We will be planting trees with our partner BLG at Landgoed Geijsteren in Limburg. Our morning event will start with an introduction to reforestation and it's importance in fighting climate change, which we will conduct together with our planting partner Bosgroepen. Afterwards we will spend the rest of the morning to help Landgoed Geijsteren with their tree planting project!

items.name: Morning tree planting event with EY

fields.event-name: Morning tree planting event with EY
fields.event_details: During this morning event with EY we will be restoring an area that used to be monoculture forest and that was devastated by disease. We will start with an introduction on reforestation, why it is important and why we need to create a biodiverse forest on this location specifically. Afterwards, we will be working the rest of the morning to help create this new forest!

items.name: Big Family Planting in Las Rozas 2024

fields.event-name: Big Family Planting in Las Rozas 2024
fields.event_details:
The first open event of the European Tree Planting Day was a massive success! Around 1200 people participated not only in the ecological restoration of the area, but could also enjoy the cultural shows and environmental workshops that were held by the Las Rozas City Hall.

Our fourth year of collaboration in a row, and making it more successfull and unique every time! Thanks to all participants and the Las Rozas municipality for the amazing job!
fields.subscription_instructions: People can join freely by attending the event during the designated hours. It starts at 10:00am and lasts for around 5 hours. Find more information in the Las Rozas Municipality webpage: https://www.lasrozas.es/node/10799

items.name: Training young Terra Leaders in Las Rozas

fields.event-name: Training young Terra Leaders in Las Rozas
fields.event_details:
The planting activity was a great success! A sunny day was the perfect environment to train these young volunteers, who assisted the Great Family Planting of Las Rozas 2024 and helped not only to pleant but also to tag the trees.

Great job! We hope to see you again in the field soon.

items.name: Planting with the Green Helmets Project in Las Rozas

fields.event-name: Planting with the Green Helmets Project in Las Rozas
fields.event_details:
On Thursday 21 November, Cascos Verdes (Green Helmets) and employees from Amazon and Amazon Web Services gathered in Las Rozas, Madrid, to plant 150 trees and shrubs to restore the Dehesa de Navalcarb√≥n.

The planting took place alongside a local school, Colegio Zola, where employees and students learned not only about planting but also about local species and the importance of caring for the environment.

The Green Helmets initiative aims to reforest and carry out work to improve the forest environment after the 2021 fires in Andalusia, south of Spain. Now, they are also expanding their reforestation efforts across the country.

We enjoyed the enthusiasm and energy of the Amazon employees, who, divided into groups, did amazing work hand in hand with the students.

At the end of the activity, and because we still had some time left, participants also learned about an insect hotel that is placed next to the planting site, which will help to attract pollinators and foster a healthier ecosystem around it.

We hope this will be the first of many collaborations!

Life Terra now offers the unique opportunity to plant trees close to Paris. The 14th century castle ‚ÄúFerme de Chateaupers‚Äù in Roinville is the venue where we'll be planting nearly 5,000 trees to help restore the land. The goal of the events is to plant a diverse mix of plant species inside and around the farm‚Äôs boundaries, as well as in some crop-field margins, to create windbreaks, biodiversity hubs, and new orchards.

The plantings will also be used to create ‚Äúgreen infrastructure‚Äù to connect different pockets of forest and thus reconnect habitats. This will reinforce local biodiversity and enhance the resilience of the local ecosystem to extreme climatic events.

We'll kick off this project with the help of Adyen's Paris team, making France the 6th country (after Netherlands, Spain, Italy, UK and Sweden) for this internationally operating payment platform specialist. Let's plant!

We are going to restore a forest area in order to contribute to Germany's ongoing silviculture conversion towards stronger climate resiliency. At this specific event, NVIDIANs from the Munich office have the opportunity to be part of Life Terra‚Äôs mission, planting trees with their colleagues and making a direct positive impact.

items.name: One Tree Planted event with DLL near Den Bosch

fields.event-name: One Tree Planted event with DLL near Den Bosch

fields.event_details:
The new Avenue of Freedom was established on Saturday, November 9th, in the Broumov region, where persecution of clergy from all over Czechoslovakia was concentrated during the previous communist regime. In the 1950s, an internment camp for priests and monks from various orders was set up in the local Benedictine monastery. By planting the Avenue of Freedom, we commemorated the past and expressed our respect for those who suffered and fought for our freedom.

The event is organized within the project ‚ÄûPlanting Our Future‚Äù, supported by the International Visegrad Fund. Its aim is to exchange knowledge and experience in the field of tree planting and tree care programs in Poland, the Czech Republic and Slovakia.

Project partners: Fundusz Partnerstwa, Klub Gaja (Poland), Nadace Partnerstv√≠ (Czechia), Nad√°cia Ekopolis (Slovakia).

The planting of the Avenue of Freedom takes place as part of the European Tree Planting Day initiative, which aims to unite communities, schools and environmental organisations across Europe to plant trees.

Initiative partners: Life Terra Foundation (Netherlands), Nadace Partnerstv√≠ (Czechia).

items.name: ABN AMRO tree planting event at Mari√´nwaerdt

fields.event-name: ABN AMRO tree planting event at Mari√´nwaerdt
fields.event_details: During this event ABN AMRO will be planting trees at the beautiful estate of Mari√´nwaerdt. After an introduction on how to plant a tree and why it is important to plant a tree, the ABN AMRO employees will be helping to reforest an area that has been devastated by ash die-back. By planting a mix of endemic species, the area will restore more quickly and be more resilient to such deceases in future.

items.name: Ecological restoration continues in Santa Clara a Velha

fields.event-name: Ecological restoration continues in Santa Clara a Velha
fields.event_details:
The Ecological Restoration of Santa Clara a Velha area, Odemira Municipality (Portugal), has been active since 2022. As of today more than 80 hectares have been restored with over 65.000 native trees!

This former exhausted eucalyptus monoculture is being transformed into a biodiverse food forest using a mixture of native species and allowing natural regeneration to happen, while creating local job opportunities.

The local fauna seems to enjoy it as well, as wildhogs have been actively eating the first pine nuts and wild strawberries. It is foreseen to plant 7.500 extra plants to make up for the damage these animals have caused.

The fact that local fauna is attracted to the new ecological niche is a great indicator of success, but we have to keep taking care of the trees during their first years. Lets remember that maintenance is as important as a proper implementation effort!

Myliu MiskƒÖ is organising a tree planting event to help green our local area and promote environmental sustainability! Together, we‚Äôll plant trees, restore nature, and make a lasting positive impact for future generations.

items.name: Tree Planting at Naranjas del Carmen organic farm

fields.event-name: Tree Planting at Naranjas del Carmen organic farm
fields.event_details: The professional team of Naranjas del Carmen, an organic farm near Valencia, will plant a mixture of trees and shrubs to diversify the existing species and boost agrodiversity and biodiversity. This initiative aims to implement regenerative agriculture practices to enhance resilient ecosystems within and around the farm.

items.name: Miyawaki Forest Planting, ELTE Dormitory Nagyt√©t√©nyi √∫t

fields.event-name: Miyawaki Forest Planting, ELTE Dormitory Nagyt√©t√©nyi √∫t
fields.event_details: It was a wonderful day and a successful planting done in about 3 hours, it was uplifting to see the large number of participants, the wide range of ages, each well represented, there were many young children who will be the beneficiaries of these plants the decades to come.

During our first collaboration with Mapletree in Poland, we've planted 1000 trees near the Narew river, close to Warsaw! This new riparian forest will increase the biodiversity on the flood plane close to the river, as we've planted 5 native species that are adapted to thriving in wet conditions. This new forest will become part of Mapletree's European reforestation efforts, together with our planting projects in the UK and the Netherlands!

The Adax team joined us with incredible enthusiasm, bringing positive energy and a strong spirit for a day of planting in the forest. From the very start, everyone immersed themselves in the experience, sharing laughs, enjoying the fresh air, and working together to plant 600 birch trees‚Äîa fantastic contribution to our mission! After the hard work, we gathered for tea and cookies, savoring a warm, cozy break in the heart of nature. It was truly inspiring to see such teamwork and dedication, and we‚Äôre beyond grateful for their support. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome the Adax team back next year to continue growing this forest together!

Start is 8.30 am and it goes until the last tree is planted, so maybe until 5.30 pm.
fields.subscription_instructions: If you want to participate please write an email to info@miya-forest.de with the subject "Tiny Forest in R√ºsselsheim". We will then provide you with all the necessary information :)

items.name: there for trees - Planting with kids in Domat/Ems

fields.event-name: there for trees - Planting with kids in Domat/Ems
fields.event_details: In beautiful weather, the children took part in a special planting day, where trees were planted, and climate action was discussed. The entire event unfolded in a joyful atmosphere‚Äîwith many beaming children excited to get involved. All plants were successfully set in the ground, and each child had the opportunity to actively participate. The teacher was especially pleased, witnessing the children's enthusiasm, and at the end, expressed her excitement about making this an annual event. It was an inspiring day that brought young people closer to nature conservation, one they will hopefully remember for a long time.

Cada √°rbol ha sido plantado por un grupo de 3¬∫ de primaria (participaron un total de 85 alumn@s, 25 por cada √°rbol, m√°s los 4 tutores y la responsable del proyecto medioambiental). Adem√°s contamos con la colaboraci√≥n del alumnado mayor, de 6¬∫, que prepararon el terreno (15 alumn@s).

fields.event_details:
La plantaci√≥n se ha realizado con alumnos de 4¬∫ de la ESO pertenecientes a la materia de PROYECTO cient√≠fico que est√° impartida por los departamentos de Biolog√≠a y Geolog√≠a y F√≠sica y Quimica del centro.

Our group helped the local nature association to plant this hedge in an agricultural area where biodiversity is usually very low. Children, adults, parents, friends and elderly people joined forces and planted these shrubs with a lot of fun and in record time!

items.name: Agora Portals International School planting tree day!!

fields.event-name: Agora Portals International School planting tree day!!
fields.event_details:
Today, our two classes of 5-year-old students arrived at the designated planting area near the entrance of our school, so we expect them to show their parents and show them their tree.

They were thrilled to see our gardener, Juanma, prepared with the trees, soil, gloves, shovels, watering cans, and everything needed for the planting activity.

Once there, we asked the children why trees are so important and what they need to live. A variety of enthusiastic answers emerged: ‚ÄúThey need water,‚Äù ‚ÄúThey give us fruit‚Äù, ‚ÄúThey don‚Äôt like plastic,‚Äù and ‚ÄúThey clean the air.‚Äù

After this discussion, all the students helped Juanma by adding soil around the trees and stamping the ground to keep it firm. Some even picked up bits of litter they found nearby, proudly declaring that the trees wouldn‚Äôt like that. It was a wonderful day of learning and teamwork, and we can‚Äôt wait to watch our trees grow!
Vamos a realizar plantaci√≥n de especies tanto en los patios y recintos del colegio como en el campo de futbol adyacente. La plantaci√≥n tendr√° lugar el 29 de noviembre (si el clima lo permite)

This was a great day where over 300 people gathered together to become friends and help nature. Children with their families, volunteer organizations and fire protection services joined in to plant. As a result 500 new trees got planted and watered, ready to keep on growing healthy under our supervision for the next 3 years.
fields.subscription_instructions: People can join us on this day. Post will be uploaded on our social media, instagram@we4all_official and our website www.we4all.com as well as they can contact us at info@we4all.com

Together with classes from Reichenbach, we will enhance the forest edge, planting a variety of species that promote biodiversity and strengthen the forest‚Äôs climate resilience. Over two days, a total of 500 shrubs and trees will be planted.
Realizar plantaci√≥n de √°rboles aut√≥ctonos en el IES Luis Bu√±uel de Alcorc√≥n, con la colaboraci√≥n de la Concejal√≠a de Parques y Jardines del Ayuntamiento.

Hallo! Wij zijn Mirte, Evi en Kristof, en samen dromen we van een groener Haspengouw. Help jij mee om onze droom werkelijkheid te maken?

Wat kun je verwachten op 24 november?

‚Ä¢ Bomen planten: De bomen die we samen dankzij de crowdfunding mogelijk hebben gemaakt. Wij voorzien schoppen, maar je mag zeker ook je eigen materiaal meenemen. Denk aan een schop, laarzen, en voor de kinderen kan een emmertje en een klein schupje leuk zijn om mee te helpen!

‚Ä¢ Eten en drinken: Bij de start om 10:00 uur kun je genieten van een croissant met koffie of water. ‚Äôs Middags voorzien we voor elke deelnemer twee broodjes met koffie of water.

‚Ä¢ Geleide wandeling: Ontdek het natuurgebied met een gids die je alles vertelt over de unieke flora en fauna in Helshoven.

‚Ä¢ Gezellige voorzieningen: Er is een tentje waar je even kunt uitrusten en samenkomen met andere deelnemers.

Datum: Zondag 24 november 2024

Locatie: Helshovenstraat, Borgloon

Tijd: 10:00 ‚Äì 14:00 uur

Parkeren: Er is parkeergelegenheid langs de Helshovenstraat.

Kom samen met ons deze dag beleven en draag je steentje bij aan een groener Borgloon!

La organizaci√≥n del evento est√° a√∫n en el aire ya que el jueves 14 de noviembre mantendremos una reuni√≥n el Comit√© Ambiental del IES Europa con el concejal de Medio Ambiente para organizar la reforestaci√≥n. Se intentar√° realizarla en un enclave natural cercano a la localidad donde coinciden varias figuras de protecci√≥n y se esta desarrollando un proyecto life para la recuperaci√≥n del √Åguila Perdicera (Zona del Castillo de Chuecos). Queremos aprovechar la ocasi√≥n para dar a conocer los Espacios Naturales Protegidos cercanos y como pueden beneficiarnos.

Tenemos pensado en hacer una peque√±a fiesta con una batucada realizada por las familias de la escuela o banda musical, tambi√©n realizada por las familias. Tambi√©n quer√≠amos invitar a que participen las familias que puedan asistir y que disfruten de un evento bonito junto a sus peque√±@s. Invitaremos a la Concejala de educaci√≥n del Ayuntamiento y la representante del Ayuntamiento del Consejo Escolar. As√≠ como la participaci√≥n incondicional de tod@s los alumn@s del centro educativo, primer y segundo ciclo de Educaci√≥n Infantil.

Vamos a repoblar un terreno que tenemos en el centro, en el cual ya hay plantados unos √°rboles. Nuestra intenci√≥n es formar un bosque ecosostenible con √°rboles aut√≥ctonos y con la implicaci√≥n de toda la comunidad educativa.
Queremos formar un bosque ecosostenible en un terreno de nuestro colegio con la ayuda de toda la comunidad educativa.

items.name: Creating a Woven Hedge at Boerderij Hartstocht near Abcoude

fields.event-name: Creating a Woven Hedge at Boerderij Hartstocht near Abcoude
fields.event_details: Behind the Hartstocht farm in Abcoude, together with the Grond Verbond foundation, we are going to construct a woven hedge along the boundary path. Woven hedges have been around for a long time and were widely used as field fencing in the past. The hedges consist of small trees and shrubs, often with spines or thorns, woven together to provide a strong fence. We plant the different varieties in random order and after growing out for 5-6 years, the trees are braided and pruned, creating a natural hedge of between 1.5 and 2 meters high. At this farm, cows walking along on both sides of the hedge will do most of the pruning, making the hedge increasingly full and more attractive to insects and birds. A wicker hedge is an important addition to countryside biodiversity!

PMO bridge organizes events for project managers and instead of giving a goodie bag, they support NGO Myliu miska and in their name they plant a tree! So this saturday we had an honour to plant the trees!

In a joint project with the Evangelische Stiftung Alsterdorf, we will plant the first part of a small, new forest at Gut Stegen. As always, we will be planting native trees using the Miyawaki method.

Please note: The area is somewhat hidden and not easily accessible by public transport. Please park only in the designated parking area, as there are no spaces directly at the planting site.

En una inspiradora jornada de acci√≥n clim√°tica, los alumnos de 6¬∫ de Primaria del Colegio Casvi Boadilla participaron activamente en el European Tree Planting Day. Como parte de los preparativos, los estudiantes aprendieron a identificar especies nativas adecuadas para el terreno de su escuela y sus alrededores. Utilizando aplicaciones como Pl@ntNet y consultando herramientas digitales como ARCGIS, seleccionaron cuidadosamente √°rboles adaptados al clima local evitando especies invasoras y considerando aquellas en peligro de extinci√≥n.

La actividad comenz√≥ con din√°micas grupales que motivaron a los alumnos a reflexionar sobre el cambio clim√°tico y c√≥mo sus acciones pueden contribuir al cuidado del medio ambiente. Tras la explicaci√≥n te√≥rica y demostraci√≥n pr√°ctica realizada por los docentes, los estudiantes se dividieron en grupos peque√±os para llevar a cabo la plantaci√≥n. Equipados con palas y azadones, plantaron cuidadosamente los √°rboles (casta√±o, nogal, granado y n√≠spero) siguiendo las instrucciones para asegurar su correcto crecimiento.

Para garantizar el seguimiento de los √°rboles plantados, cada ejemplar fue etiquetado utilizando la plataforma Life Terra. Los estudiantes registraron datos sobre las especies y ubicaciones mediante smartphones, integr√°ndolos en el mapa global de Life Terra.

We managed to gather a very enthusiastic group of volunteers from several organisations, such as Pego Viu, Musica Pel Clima, Tornem Cultura i Sostenibilitat and of course Desert Leaves. The weather was ideal for the planting, and we managed to put a few hundred trees in the ground. After the event, Pego Viu treated us with drinks and empanadas, with musical entertainement organized by Elio, Guille, Ver√≤nica.

items.name: Planting in The Green Rebel Farm with College Hageveld

fields.event-name: Planting in The Green Rebel Farm with College Hageveld
fields.event_details:
The planting activity at The Green Rebel farm in Miravet was an inspiring and hands-on experience for everyone involved. Over the five-day event, 24 students from College Hageveld, accompanied by three teachers, planted 200 trees in Hageveld‚Äôs Foodforest, continuing their tradition of planting one tree for each graduating student. The students worked enthusiastically, learning about regenerative agroforestry practices while preparing the soil with biochar, sowing fava beans, and adding mulch and cover crops to ensure the trees thrive in the challenging Mediterranean conditions.

The atmosphere was vibrant, with students enjoying the process of planting and gaining a deeper understanding of how these actions contribute to combating climate change. The weather was cooperative, with sunny days making the work enjoyable. In addition to planting, the group bonded over shared meals they prepared with fresh produce harvested from the farm, creating a strong connection to the land and to each other. This event not only added 200 more trees to the food forest but also planted seeds of awareness and hope in the minds of young people, empowering them to take action for a sustainable future.

items.name: Networking event at Boerderij Hartstocht Abcoude

fields.event-name: Networking event at Boerderij Hartstocht Abcoude
fields.event_details:
Behind the Hartstocht farm in Abcoude, together with the Grond Verbond foundation, we are going to construct a woven hedge along the boundary path. Woven hedges have been around for a long time and were widely used as field fencing in the past. The hedges consist of small trees and shrubs, often with spines or thorns, woven together to provide a strong fence. We plant the different varieties in random order and after growing out for 5-6 years, the trees are braided and pruned, creating a natural hedge of between 1.5 and 2 meters high. At this farm, cows walking along on both sides of the hedge will do most of the pruning, making the hedge increasingly full and more attractive to insects and birds. A wicker hedge is an important addition to countryside biodiversity!

During this event we have invited multiple of our partners. This will not only give them the opportunity to connect with nature, but also connect to other organisations and people in their sector.

‚ÄúLab Aberto fosters creativity and technological innovation in schools by establishing specialized laboratories. In these spaces, students build flying wings, autonomous cars and boats, and create objects using 3D printers with a variety of materials. Lab Aberto prepares students for the technological challenges of the future by engaging them in the artificial universe. However, Lab Aberto and its partner, Life Terra, believe that this admirable artificial world of the future will be even better when it is synergistically aligned with human nature and ecological sustainability.

On November 30th, the event began in the laboratory, with its coordinator, Ant√≥nio Gon√ßalves, explaining the initiative and its objectives. Following this, 25 volunteers sowed cork oak acorns into small ceramic pots produced with a 3D printer. These seedlings will grow into saplings to be planted next year. Clara Ara√∫jo, representing ALTRI Florestal, and Renato Ferreira from the Municipality of Torres Vedras explained the entire process.

After the sowing activity, we moved to the field to plant strawberry trees. Lab Aberto aims to work increasingly at the intersection of forestry and technology. ALTRI, the Municipality of Torres Vedras, and Life Terra will continue to collaborate with Lab Aberto, and in a year, our cork oak saplings will be ready for planting.‚Äù

Echten - With a push of the green button, Albert Verlinde (chairman of the National Tree Planting Day Foundation), Inge Nieuwenhuizen (mayor of the municipality of De Wolden) and Sylvo Thijsen (director of Staatsbosbeheer) opened the 67th National Tree Planting Day today at Staatsbosbeheer-forest ranger's office Ruinen in Echten . During this green holiday, thousands of pupils throughout the Netherlands left their classrooms and went into their residential areas or nature to plant trees.

Donn√© Slangen, Director-General of Nature and Fisheries of the Ministry of Agriculture, Fisheries, Food Security and Nature confirmed later that day the importance of nature education for all children. Together with a number of children, he planted a tree in the Ruinen forestry in the municipality of De Wolden (Drenthe). In doing so, he and all the other planters became, according to columnist Marcel van Ool, advisor on landscape and cultural history of Staatsbosbeheer, 'part of a miracle'.

Para la realizaci√≥n de esta actividad, contamos con una serie de familiares interesados en ayudarnos con la plantaci√≥n. Despu√©s, transmitiremos lo que se ha hecho al resto de familias.

Launching event of the school tree nursery. Children from Early years to Middle school have been assigned a local tree or bush species to learn about in class and they will plant clippings or seeds in pots they have previously decorated. They will take care of their pot throughout the year and learn more about their class species.

Join us this Saturday for our next Boranka reforestation campaign in the beautiful Plano neighborhood of Trogir. Volunteers will come together to plant native trees, contributing to the restoration of local forests and the fight against climate change.

This action marks part of Boranka's longstanding commitment to reforestation, with previous campaigns already involving thousands of volunteers planting over 140,000 trees in Croatia. All tools and guidance will be provided, and participants will have the chance to make a lasting impact on the environment while enjoying a rewarding day outdoors.

Quinta da Penha Longa is a property close to Sintra and Cascais, well known for its natural and built heritage, but also for including the Caesar Park Penha Longa Golf Resort Hotel and a set of residential areas. On the forest area of Quinta da Penha Longa, Caesar Park is developing an ambitious program of rewilding and control of invasive species. In 2023, Life Terra had the opportunity to organize, together with Caesar Park, a planting event associated with this program.

The idea that citizens should be involved in rewilding processes is the central idea of the Life Terra project. This is also the central idea of the event to be held on December 10th at Quinta da Penha Longa, where residents together with the company's employees will, once again, participate directly in the planting operations of native species included in the rewilding program. This event will have the support of Cascais Ambiente, the environment agency of the Cascais municipality

The Caesar Park‚Äôs transformative idea that the natural value of the forest space is an important dimension of the resort's quality, justifying relevant investments in its conservation, is also strongly associated with Life Terra's objectives and action in multiple areas in Europe.

Join Us for the 43rd Boranka Reforestation Action in Greba≈°tica!

We invite you to be part of a meaningful event where we come together to restore the wildfire-affected Jelinjak hill in Greba≈°tica. On this special day, we will plant oak, ash, cypress, and other native species to help regenerate the forest and combat the impacts of climate change.
Planting event with Abbott. Working on reforestation in naturally degraded areas. Planning to plant saplings of holm oak, cypress, black ash, and Aleppo pine.
Join us at 10am until 1pm to help plant 600S native Irish trees & shrubs. We'll provide all of the necessary equipment but do wear sturdy footwear and bring your own gloves.
